subject: Baseball
Airlines and Airplanes
lead_paragraph: Cory Lidle and Chris Woodward grew up a few miles apart in Covina, Calif., a town on the eastern edge of Los Angeles that produces major league baseball players and airplane aficionados.
snippet: Cory Lidle and Chris Woodward grew up a few miles apart in Covina, Calif., a town on the eastern edge of Los Angeles that produces major league baseball players and airplane aficionados.
